text: Goe hagalee belee duu i di gowaa e buni ai nia ala, e kumi digau ala e hagamada e llele gi daha. Goe hagalee belee wanga digaula gi nadau hagadaumee i di nadau madagoaa e tale gi di haingadaa.1.14 Isaiah 34.5-17; 63.1-6; Jeremiah 49.7-22; Ezekiel 25.12-14; 35.1-15; Amos 1.11-12; Malachi 1.2-5
